html:
Nov 11 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *3I GROUP PLC - GROUP FINANCE DIRECTOR SUCCESSION *3I GROUP - JULIA WILSON, GROUP FINANCE DIRECTOR, HAS INFORMED BOARD THAT SHE INTENDS TO RETIRE AFTER AGM IN JUNE 2022 *3I GROUP - WILSON WILL BE SUCCEEDED BY JAMES HATCHLEY, WHO IS CURRENTLY 3I GROUP STRATEGY DIRECTOR. *3I GROUP - JAMES WILL JOIN GROUP BOARD AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE EFFECTIVE MAY 2022


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 11-NOV-202107:02:00 GMT
